value.title: Dynamically remove columns that contain a specific word in the header - Power Query
value.excerpt: It is very common when importing data from excel or pdfs that you get a lot of empty columns. In today's video I will show you how to remove those columns dynamically using power query. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. For example, if you were displaying revenue by country and had no sales in Norway, then Norway would not appear anywhere in your visualization.  In this video we will show you how to display empty categories or show
